plugin.title: Analyze
plugin.author: Topspin Media
plugin.description: This plugin tracks awe.sm conversions and Google Analytics events. It makes a call to awe.sm's conversion API when passed an awesm=awesm_id parameter in the flashvars.

flashvar.name: awesmkey
flashvar.description: The awe.sm api key whose awesm_ids will receive conversion calls.

flashvar.name: gakey
flashvar.description: The GA account that will receive event calls.
